channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery to Split Into Two Companies
item.description: The film and television giant will turn its cable networks, including CNN and TNT, into one company and its streaming and studios business into anothe...

item.title: Milan Kovac ran Elon Musk’s most important project: What the departure of the Optimus head means for Tesla
item.description: “This one hits different. You’re in the Tesla hall of fame, brother,” wrote one senior Tesla manager.

item.title: Tony Awards Unforgettable Looks: Cole Escola, Nicole Scherzinger, and More
item.description: Sequins and velvet and shorts, oh my!

item.title: As more customers default on BNPL loans, Klarna’s CEO predicts AI will cause a recession
item.description: Sebastian Siemiatkowski foresees mass AI-induced headcount reductions among white collar workers.

item.title: Amazon’s MGM is reportedly making a film about Sam Altman being kicked out of OpenAI
item.description: Artificial has yet to be cast, but big names are circling.

item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’s Ex-Girlfriend Recalls Pushing Back Against ‘Dark, Sleazy’ Sex
item.description: The woman, known in court as Jane, has testified that she felt obligated to participate in sex marathons with male escorts because Sean Combs was payi...

item.title: Nicole Scherzinger and Other Tony Winners Party After the Awards
item.description: Stars turned out for show tunes and spirited celebrations that included an official after-party at the Museum of Modern Art and a gathering at the Car...

item.title: Exclusive: Coinbase vets raise $30 million for crypto wallet startup Turnkey
item.description: The fundraise attracted big VC names like Bain Capital Crypto, Sequoia Capital and Lightspeed Faction.

item.title: U.S. and China Meet at Precarious Moment in Trade War
item.description: Officials from both sides are meeting on Monday in London, aiming to resolve differences over tariffs and supply chains that have endangered a fragile...

item.title: SINKs need to earn at least $81,000 to live comfortably in America’s cheapest state—the most expensive require an $120,000 salary
item.description: Hawaii is the state where single adults need to earn the most to feel financially comfortable, while West Virginia is the most affordable.

item.title: Ukraine Says Russia Launched 499 Missiles and Drones in Biggest Air Assault of War
item.description: Most of the drones and missiles were intercepted, according to the Ukrainian Air Force, and there were no immediate reports of widespread damage.

item.title: Israel Intercepts Gaza-Bound Aid Ship With Greta Thunberg Aboard
item.description: Israel had vowed to prevent the vessel from reaching Gaza, saying its military would use “any means necessary” to stop it from breaching a naval block...

item.title: More Chaos Plagues New Gaza Aid System

item.title: Map: 6.3-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Colombia
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.
